name: Reed Rogers
text: Once you walk into The Picture Show gift shop, the wonderful smell leaves you feeling great all day.  There is such an incredible variety of gifts for any occasion you could want, and more.  Michelle creates an environment that you will want to come back to day after day to get gifts and visit.  HIGHLY recommended!

name: Vince Napoli
text: Great variety of Swan Creek candles! The Gingerbread and Hazelnut scents are amazing and last so long. Nice selection of cute signs and other decor items. The owner is so helpful and kind.

name: Livin the dream with Chuck and Lola
text:
One of the most eclectic shops in the area. You can look for hours and always find something new.

Something for everyone.

name: Valerie Burnes
text: Maggie is so very helpful! The displays are well done, and they have everything you need to show your support for Mother Judson!

name: AJ Arnett
text: Always great to see Maggie and shop for new Judson items.

name: Alicia Brown
text: Great prices.

name: Amy
text: Great staff! Cute shirts good smelling candles!!!

name: Daphne A
text: Get your Judson spirit!

name: Lauren
text: Cool shop with unique souvenirs! I got a beautiful oyster ornament that was hand painted. Staff was friendly and we made great small talk! Great place to stop by!

name: Martha Jordan
text: Festive gift shop with Mardi Gras/Creole theme. Gracious host/owner. Beads with purchase - Fun.

name: Ray Weinshenker
text: Amazing shop for locals AND out of towers! Gary is just the absolute sweetest!

name: Hilarie Adams
text: Awesome place! Great place for any local or visitor to stop by. They have everything Mardi Gras or Mobile you will need.

name: Alleigh Brown
text: Super sweet staff, chill vibe, great souvenirs and gifts. Perfect place to stop when passing through or visiting. :)

name: Courtney Joe
text: Has a lot of cute souvenirs.

name: Tonya forston
text: Very nice  owner was very nice a must to go see and get some souvenirs

name: Lisa Bumpers
text: I love it there, reminds me of the good old days... Lol 😂

name: Casey Fincher
text: lovely shop, very sweet staff

name: John Lapczynski
text: Come here for any Mobile Souvenirs that you may need. There have stuff I have not seen anywhere else, Masks, Ornaments, T-shirts, all sorts of cool stuff. Support a local small business who keeps the cool stuff around.

name: Sara Kate Lambert
text: Such a fun store and wonderful staff!! Thank you for opening!!!

name: Jason Solida
text: Great gifts in Friendly staff

name: julie stoddard
text:
Met the owner this evening! He chatted with us and gave us an ice cream shop recommendation. He even had salt and pepper shakers for my collection (although technically they were both pepper shakers ;)) When we looked in our bag he had put necklaces in for our kids. Nice surprise! Stop in and say hi; it's a fun shop.

Update to the owner's response: The shakers both have a P!

resp.text: Thank you…. I look on the back it should have a S or P to tell them apart.if not I’ll let me know and I’ll send the the one you don’t have.

name: Lynn Pope
text: One of the best burgers ever! The store/ Cafe was very clean and well organized, our food was cooked to order, the fries were fresh  and the staff was very friendly. Lisa was very kind and helpful. We will make the drive again. Thank you for a great experience 💜

resp.text: Thank you Lynn for your review! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Sierra Nave
text: My husband ordered the Blue Hole burger & tater wedges. He said it tasted like a homemade burger. Don't get no better than that. It was only a 1/2 pound of meat, but this burger was huge!

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We do strive for the homemade taste!  Look forward to seeing you again!

name: PR Heinl
text: Good food, a little slow on service, but they were busy. So, I'll give them a pass, the staff was friendly, enjoyed the visit. In response to the reply: I understand, still a great experience. Enjoyed the bacon cheeseburger, it was excellent.

resp.text: So glad you enjoyed your food. Sorry to hear about the service we are short staffed at the moment but doing our best to bring in new help. Hope to see you again soon.

name: Shana Durdin
text: Stopped here for lunch after hiking at Little River NP. We had burgers, bologna sandwiches and BLT’s and everything was so good! Lots of picnic tables outside to hang out and eat!

resp.text: Shana we are so glad you guys choose  to stop and have lunch with us. We do appreciate your feedback we depend on our customers letting us know when we get it right. Please stop by the next time you get a chance. Thanks so very much.

name: Eden Smith
text: My husband and I stopped in for a quick dinner and discovered karaoke night! We were quickly served and it was the best cheeseburger and fries in town. Food was hot fresh and prepared just the way one would want. Bathroom was also squeaky clean and all attendants were courteous and made us feel welcomed! We will definitely return! I just feel like this place needs more recognition!

resp.text: We are so glad you guys had a good experience with us and look forward to serving you again soon.

name: Brenda Bone
text: Awesome food, very friendly staff and I will go back. I had the steak and cheese sandwich with okra.

resp.text: Brenda you are so kind to take time to write us such a great review. Thank you and hope to serve you again soon.

name: Jeffrey Hudson
text: Food was amazing,  Cheese sticks, patti melt for me, and my wife loved her chicken sandwich. Great value and prices are good. Homemade ranch was the perfect finish.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We appreciate your business and hope to see you again soon!

name: Shannon Marsicano
text: We stopped here after a hike at the waterfall. Staff was all friendly and pleasant to meet! Also BBQ pork sandwiches with slaw from the cafe were on point!

resp.text: Thank you Shannon for your feedback great way for us to know our customers and how we are doing. We hope you will come back soon. Have a great weekend.

name: Richard Hartline
text: Great food and nice people. My wife and I love everything we have ordered. They serve breakfast, lunch, and supper. You can eat from the hot bar or order off the menu. Good portions, too. So far, I've ordered take out, but they have seating for about 30 people. It is also a convenience store and gas station.

name: Luann Chastain
text: Yummy!  Everything is cooked after you order!  Really good bacon burger.  Patty filled the bun and was really flavorful and juicy!  Worth the twisty road to get there.

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We look forward to seeing you again! Have great day!

name: Clark L
text:
We were visiting the Little River Canyon area and stopped by. We were warmly greeted as we came in and also chatted with the folks behind "the grill". I asked what the favorites were on the menu and the prompt reply was "really, everything is good." Well, I can't vouch for everything, because we only tried the breakfast burritos 😊 The good: ample portion and tasty.
The so-so : rather salty and it took QUITE a while to prepare. Now, since we were meandering and not in a hurry, not a problem for us , but, you may want to be aware. Also have some Tshirts, souvenirs and grocery items ( that you pass on the way to a clean bathroom).

name: Todd Milsaps
text:
Granted there's not a lot of competition in the immediate area... But, having said that, the food and prices here are worth bouncing in for a hot meal if you are visiting Little River Canyon National Park. No need to make the drive into town to eat at a chain restaurant.
The staff is always very nice and you'll get your burger / chicken / BBQ quickly and be back at the Hippie Hole satisfied and full.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review! We appreciate your business and are glad you stopped in to see us!

name: Dustin Morgan
text: Incredible service!! Friendly staff!! Delicious food!! We stopped in after driving past for lunch and had a great experience!! Here on vacation and would definitely recommend to anyone passing by!!

resp.text: Thank you so much we try hard and truly appreciate all of you guys.

name: Alex Harry
text: This place is great. Amazing food, friendly staff. Wonderful after a day out climbing I  the little river caynon. Would highly recommend 👍

resp.text: Thank you so much Alex for taking the time to leave us a review.  We appreciate your kind word and you business we hope to serve you again soon.

name: SlushyCatDude
text: This place is a very great store. the place has become more and more popular with a new owner. not a fast food place it's a great food place. lately, they have been jam-packed, but they still deliver. all staff are hard working and don't slack off. some people don't understand that their not a fast food place they're a restaurant. they can't make great food fast when understaffed. but if you wait a while talking to the locals or look around the store while they make the food you'll be surprised how great the food is. many people can't wait and that's understandable but don't say that they are a bad store if you don't have the patience to get great food.

resp.text: Thank you for your review and your understanding of our desire to always put out the best food possible.  We appreciate your kind words.

name: Marilyn Custer
text: Coming from Geraldine we were looking for a Mom n’Pop place for breakfast and this is what we found. Don’t be deceived by the store front. The food was good, really good, and the people were so friendly. We were glad to find it and will be back!!

name: Sue In TN
text: I read about this place online, and since we were headed up to the Little River Canyon Preserve, we decided to stop in here for a quick lunch.  Based on the reviews, it sounded wonderful.  I got a cheeseburger combo which was only a little over $6.00 and included my drink.   Wow.... I really think it was the best cheeseburger that I've ever had.... the french fries were those 'crinkle' kind and were so good... not one bit greasy.  Our food was ready very quickly, and everyone there was so nice and friendly.  Don't pay any attention to that poster who only gave it a one star.  It seems as though they were there during the World's Longest Yard Sale which brought so many people to the area, and they must have been swamped.  That is only once per year...... it's not a typical occurrence for them to be slow.  Focus on all the other reviews which are 5 stars.

resp.text: Thank your for your nice review. We appreciate your business!

name: Laura McKenzie
text: The grilled chicken sandwiches were delicious.  Our order was accidentally picked up by another family. The staff quickly cooked, from scratch, a new order and were as kind as could be.  Great place to stop after hiking.

resp.text: We appreciate your kind words and your understanding that accidents happen.  Please come eat with us again soon.

name: Tabitha Kinser
text: Over priced and slow getting out. Food was cold.

name: Carmel McNeese
text: Just ate here, and my husband and I were pleasantly pleased. Friendly staff, big portions, and delicious food! No long wait,  to boot!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to let us know how we are doing. We have a great staff who can put out delicious food and we all take great pride in our work. We hope to see you guys again soon.

name: Jason Baldwin
text: Friendly staff unable to put out food.  I arrived at 2 p.m. on Saturday with a big appetite and high hopes after reading G reviews.  I ordered a cheeseburger at the inside window and sat down with my self-serve drink.  It should have been a tip-off that NONE of the other 10-12 seated customers had any food, only drinks.  The eating area was full of flies, and the floors were pretty dirty.  I waited and waited and waited.  After 25 MINUTES OF WAITING, some of the people there before me still did not have any food. so I cancelled my order, paid for my drink, and left.  I know this place has lots of fans, but on this particular Saturday, they seemed incapable of putting out burgers.

resp.text: We appreciate your input and it was unfortunate for you and us that you stopped in at such a busy time of the day.  We do apologize and would like you to know we are not a fast food restaurant.  We make all food to order, meaning no staging of precooked food,  our cooks prep all ingredients fresh daily.  We like to say we are not fast food we do good food fast.  With increased visitation to Little River Canyon we have become well know especially for our burgers.  If you are ever in the area again please give us another visit I promise you we are worth the wait.

name: Suzanne Phillips
text: We had the lunch special and loved it! Highly recommend this place just outside of the Little River Canyon National Preserve. Great friendly service, good prices, and indoor/outdoor dining. Hit the spot!

name: Sharon Williams
text: Love the updates. Staff are so friendly and food is delicious!

resp.text: Thank you Sharon! We are all so excited and proud of all the improvements both inside and out. We have an excellent staff who truly want each customer to have the same experience you did. We appreciate the feed back thanks for your time. We look forward to serving you again soon.

name: Keller Rongey
text: Great food. VERY pleasant staff. Clean and friendly.

name: Michael Culberson
text: We stopped to have lunch after driving around the canyon today. The hamburger was DELICIOUS!!!!! If you’re anywhere near the area, please stop here. The prices were low and the food was great.

resp.text: So glad you stopped in for a quick bite! Thank you for your business!

name: PandaMagicBooty
text: I'm amending my previous review of Ralph's because my most recent trip was fantastic. The wait was short, the food was delicious, and the staff was (and always is) friendly.

resp.text: Thank you for comments and your business.  Our apologizes for the faulty equipment it happens from time to time.  We are implementing new ideas to decrease wait time while serving the same great food. Please visit us again and thank you for your continued support of a family owned business.

name: William Gómez
text: Very delicious food and very friendly staff

resp.text: Thank you William for dining with us.  We are so glad you enjoyed your meal and so appreciate you taking the time to give us a review.  Customers such as you leaving a comment lets us know we are doing our jobs correctly.  It was a pleasure to serve you and hope to see you again soon.

name: jeremy irwin
text: These burgers are sooo good after a long day hiking the beautiful canyon! Made to order, and definitely worth the wait!! Corn nuggets and fried okra on point!

resp.text: The weather was perfect for hiking and we are so happy you finished your day with our burgers and sides! We look forward to seeing you again soon! Thank you for your business!

name: Pam Ogle
text: The BEST cheeseburgers in Fort Payne AL! And let’s not forget the AMAZING 1inch thick, light&fluffy pancakes for breakfast that are as big as the plate!!!! Great service too! Hands down my families FAVORITE restaurant for Breakfast, Lunch and Supper!

resp.text: Thank you so much! We are so glad you enjoy our burgers and pancakes! We appreciate your business and can’t wait to see you again soon!

name: Jeremy Moses
text: A must for a local burger. Great laid back atmosphere with excellent food and friendly service. If you are visiting little river canyon, make the day perfect by stopping at Ralph's.

resp.text: We appreciate your business! Thanks for stopping in!

name: Porkchopranch
text: Real good food no matter what you order. Service is very good and the prices are reasonable. Everything is fresh and served fresh. Great cheeseburgers and plate lunches.

resp.text: We appreciate your kind review. Thank you for your business!

name: Kenneth Blanchard
text: Staff was very nice and fun. I ate the large cheeseburger and it was definitely better than any gourmet burger I've had. I wish I lived closer. If you're on the area definitely stop in to eat. You won t be disappointed.

name: Scott Price
text: Love this place!! Great food and wonderful restaurants in store employees.

resp.text: Thank you Scott for your comment and support. We appreciate you and Susan and look forward to seeing you soon.

name: Clay Massengale
text: Non existent service.  Slow service was fine. I wasn’t in a hurry.  But after a 40 minute wait for a child’s cheeseburger we gave up and left.  Perhaps the four dollars they beat us out of will help them hire better employees.

resp.text: We apologize for the lack of service you experienced during your visit. During a busy weekend, we found ourselves short staffed and hope you will give us another try in the future.

name: Melanie Broome
text: AMAZING hippy burger this place hand makes the epitome of All burgers. yummmmm

resp.text: So glad you had the opportunity to dine with us and being courageous enough to try our Hippy Hole burger considering its size. Thanks so much hope to see you again soon.

name: Jason Druebert
text: Hands down the best burger in Northeast Alabama.

resp.text: Thank you Jason for taking the time to let us know how we are doing. Look forward to seeing you again.

name: Randy Williams
text: Great food always.

resp.text: Thanks Randy hope to serve you again soon.

name: Charles Curio
text:
Other guy was right, it was about 25/30 minutes and I was getting irritated...but the reply was right on..it was busy, but the food (burgers, Patty melt, fries) freaking awesome and worth the wait, hands down.
We'll come and wait, and eat again!

name: Jonathan Vance
text: Best place around!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you Jonathan we are so excited to hear from our customers. Guess it goes without saying especially when we got it exactly right for you. We appreciate your business and hope to serve you soon.

name: Richard Kuhn
text: Great place to grab breakfast, lunch, gas, or convenience items in between your little river canyon adventures. Great burgers. Clean and friendly.

name: Michael Shad
text: Very friendly staff and always good food. Best burgers within 25 miles.

resp.text: We appreciate your kind words! Thank you for your business, and we agree our burgers are the best!

name: Ron G
text: Best burgers on the mountain! Nice Lil quick stop for gas and camping supplies.

name: Lee Battles
text: Food like my Mawmaw used to make. Try it one time and check out the beautiful falls just next door.

resp.text: Within minutes from Little River Canyon and falls, we are glad you came in to visit! Come back and see us soon! Thanks!

name: J J
text: Great stop for great food!

resp.text: Thanks for stopping in! We appreciate your business and look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Becky Payne
text: On our way to have breakfast here. A favorite place to visit each time we come to Ft. Payne!

resp.text: We appreciate you coming in to have breakfast with us! Thanks for your review!

name: Austin Rampey
text: Great spot.

resp.text: Thanks for coming in to see us! We appreciate your business!

name: Rickey White
text: Best meatloaf

resp.text: Thanks Rickey! We couldn’t agree with you more!!

name: cotton w
text: I will definitely be back

resp.text: Thank you for your business! Check out our daily lunch specials on our Facebook page!

name: Drew Cottrell
text: Very friendly staff and large selection of snacks before you go into little river falls

name: Bella Dennis
text: Good good nice people

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We love our team members too! We appreciate your business and hope to see you again soon!

name: Sherie Williams
text: This was my first visit and there was so much to choose from I couldn't decide. I was assisted by staff pertaining to sizing, styles, and pricing. I enjoyed the awesome customer service and that new merchandise is received daily. I plan to return and purchase gifts for loved ones.

name: Bill Alber
text: We caught the winter sale and made out like bandits! High quality merchandise, lots of choices and the best service ever in a shop like this. We had a great time shopping here.

name: Tammy Odell
text: Great customer service

name: MASIAH09
text: Great store the Clerk was friendly and very helpful. She assisted me in looking at some items out of reach. I was able to try on the items and the changing room. The didn’t have exactly what I needed but I was happy with my purchase. Great store.

name: Susan Swain
text: Great customer service

name: Jordan Clark
text: A very cool little store for fans of the Alabama rivalry. There are tons of little things you never knew you needed.  Everything in the store is NCAA licensed product including a decent collection of Nike game jerseys. A great store to pick up gifts for the fans on your list or to pick up a little something to add to your own collection.  Highly attentive staff totally willing to help. This place is going to be a regular stop for me.

name: Anna Carden
text: Very helpful and friendly staff. Great deals with clearance on Auburn and Alabama clothes and other items!!!

name: E T
text: Great customer service & they have clearance prices

name: William Haneke
text: Great selection and super nice staff!  Con is that it is expensive, but that’s due to the licensing costs.

name: Romello Savage
text: Great customer service . Just left about 10 mins ago . Btw the clerk is Gorgeous

name: Tim Hinson
text: Really nice experience! Great staff and selection.

name: Selena Burnett
text: I just left this unprofessional so called place of business where I encountered very rude workers..I experienced complete dissatisfaction. The 2 female workers didn't part their lips to say anything to me,  even as I stood right next to them both,  but loudly greeted two caucasian guys as they entered and asked if they could assist them with anything. I will not patronize this company nor encourage or suggest anyone else do so.

name: Danny G.
text: Bought a collar for my dog! Roll Tide! Good service too!

name: P. T.
text: All they had were large and extra large tshirts.

name: Cam Aaron
text: Extremely helpful and friendly staff. They went  out of their way to assist me. Fantastic experience every time I visit.

name: Janice Chambers
text: WAR EAGLE! Really enjoy shopping here.

name: Kaleigh Flatt
text: Love this store! This is my go-to location for any Auburn t-shirts and gifts. They have a great selection and always have new stuff in stock. Very friendly and helpful!

name: Gregory
text: Gina was  great in helping me find everything I was looking for. Thanks again Gina

name: Carol Roberts
text: I love this store and I hate it moved out of Eastdale Mall. They have the best quality and selection of tshirts and other good college gear anywhere. At least it's near Kobe now so when we eat there we can visit. We do a lot of shopping here for gifts since half the family is Bama and half is Auburn. I think the store in the Mall was bigger though.

name: Ken Hargroves
text: Great selection of Alabama gear !

name: Patti Fields
text: Had what I wanted and then some. Person that TV waited on me was super nice and polite.

name: TRUMP 2020
text: I bought two long sleeve t shirts last Jan. When Bama won all the marbles . I sent one to my niece in Phoenix Az . and one for myself, they both still look new . Great selection , great quality at an affordable price . This is my go to store for my BAMA gear . RTR . 35 TO 28 .

name: Jeremy Davis
text: Helpful. Great stor3..except for one bama fan working when asked about sn auburn item kind of got an attitude

name: Mike Hollingsworth
text: Has anything you'd ever want but it is a little pricey!

name: Tom Lawery
text: The lady who helped me was awesome...Roll Tide

name: Connie L
text: Helpful sales staff. A tad pricey.

name: Tiffany Belser-Temple
text: Love the Bama side. Roll Tide

name: Kathy Stewart
text: Great selection without having to drive to Auburn or Tuscaloosa!!!  Friendly staff, broad range of clothing and other merchandise--love shopping here!!

name: michael johnson
text: It was great, got me a new Alabama shirt...

name: Lawrence Daniel
text: You can get almost anything Bama or Auburn merchandise related products here.

name: Edythe Dansby
text: Great place to buy team gear.

name: Pamela Pruett
text: Too expensive and no bowl game shirts

name: Don Johnson
text: Great selection of Auburn gear. Kind of pricey.

name: Josh Hamby
text: Great friendly people

name: Liz Trevino
text: Very friendly & great prices!!

name: Holly Taylor
text: The Best

name: illia son
text: To small

name: Erica Silva
text: Roll tide!! Great selection of products!

name: Brittany Gamble
text: The worst customer service ever!! And it came from the manager, Gina! Never will I spend money in that rude store again!!!

name: Snow Pinckard
text: Good store

name: Linda Perdue
text: Roll tide

name: Tookie Roberts
text: great

name: Evelyn Pridgeon
text: ROLL TIDE!!! ALWAYS!!!

name: Pandora Wilkerson
text: FRIENDLY SERVICE!

name: Cody Oates
text: Bout every time I go in here I buy something this time a national championship

name: Ashley Dinkins
text: Lots to choose from

name: Quamie Richardson
text:
(Translated by Google) Wde

(Original)
Wde

name: dottie logan
text:
(Translated by Google) IN-some

(Original)
AU-some

name: Vincent
text: This is the place to get your Orange Beach, AL souvenirs!  Awesome staff and the owner is fantastic!  Everyone needs a sticker to put on their water bottle or tablet.  This is the place to get it!  You can also get the best apparel to take back home!

name: Jamie
text: Great local store!  All the stuff they have was super cool but it was a bit expensive.  The dog collars were $30 and some of the sweaters were over $100.  Shop here and spend a little money and support local businesses!

name: Amy Davis
text: Adorable logos, quality merchandise, great service!

name: Sharon Bell
text: Just being at The Orange Beach Store inspires me to try explore new places. They have so much cool stuff! Here are some of my purchases: super warm down sleeping bag, annual adventure pass, sunglasses, insect repellent, energy gels, iodine tablets, wrinkle free shirt, water proof hiking boots.

name: Kelly
text: This is a boutique shop. Lots of quality Orange Beach themed shirts, sweatshirts and head gear. Everything is printed on luxury material so with that comes a higher price tag; but great little shop if you are wanting a really nice tshirt or sweatshirt that will last.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Catherine Taylor
text: I'm a dancer with high arches, and I experience problems with plantar fasciitis from time to time.  Kodi helped to fit me with custom insoles and compression socks today.  She was warm, personable, and knowledgeable.  I can tell that she sees her job as an opportunity to help people.  I will return to the store for the excellent customer service!

name: Lillian Nelson
text: This side of a million years ago (ok, more like 32), I took an "American Literature in the 1950s" course at college.   The instructors were two not-so-recovering hippies.  About 60% of the class was spent on the Beats.  And, so, I got to know Jack Kerouac and Allen Ginsberg and Lawrence Ferlinghetti (and their friends) for the first time.  I was hooked.

name: Hannah M
text: My husband and I visited OBA recently and had passed by this cute little store a few times. Sadly, I did not get a chance to stop in and check it out, but I’m so glad I decided to order online. They have the cutest selection of t-shirts as well as a variety of other items. I received my shirt just 2 days after ordering and shipping was only $3! I will definitely be ordering again and hope to visit the store when we go back!

resp.text: Thanks for shopping with us, Hannah!

name: John D. Rivas
text: Been shopping at this The Orange Beach Store for well over 10 years. Today's  service experience was a great reminder on why people have such strong brand loyalty.Kudos to Brian, bike mechanic, for coming out to offer his second opinion on my hitch install and even securing it further.The store is full of Memorial Day weekend shoppers but every employee keeps a great attitude.

resp.text: Thanks for shopping with us John!

name: Alan Harned
text: Great store and wonderful products! Support local business!

resp.text: Thanks for shopping with us, Alan! :)

name: kim farris
text:
Really only one style of graphics on the shirts and a little overpriced for me.
Very clean and nice store.

resp.text: We hope you'll come back and shop with us soon, Kim!

name: Alex Wood
text: Super cute store! Awesome logo! This was the best place in the area to find a nice decent T-shirt from my visit to Orange Beach. Good quality gifts and clean set up. Most of the other shops have nothing but junk and are a mess. Glad to support this great store! I have y’all sticker on my car!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review!!

name: Jackie Thompson
text: Always great, helpful, and friendly customer service! Products are high-quality and one of a kind. This business also gives back to the community, and adds so much to OBA!

resp.text: Thank you for your review! Come see us again soon!

name: Angela Gauthier
text: Upon entering store immediately greeted by young lady with reddish brown hair.  The receipt has Rose as the cashier.  I told her that we were just looking.  My husband, 15 year old autistic son, and I were browsing.  As we walked around we noticed that she was following me through the store.  Keep in mind we were the only black customers in the store.  She approached me again.  I told her that I did not need any help again.  I never saw her ask any one else if they needed help.  I began to feel very uncomfortable and I told my husband that I wasn't buying anything.   He said why because she keeps following you around.  I said yes.  I walked out.  He proceeded to purchase a plaque for a friend of ours who is fighting cancer.  He told her that she didn't have to follow us around we have money.  She never once apologized.   I will never shop here ever again.

resp.text: Hey Angela, I am so sorry about your terrible experience. No one deserves to be treated that way. We do not sell plaques nor do we employ anyone named Rose! Our location is 25122 Perdido Beach Blvd #7 Orange Beach, AL 36561, in-between Salt Coastal Outfitters and Tallulah's. Please come by and visit us!

name: Greg Edwards
text: Great Place.. They Have All Kinds of Stuff

resp.text: Thanks for the review! We hope to see you again soon!!

name: Lindsey Herron
text: Cute items with a fun logo. Lots of things to get besides tees.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review! See you next time you're in Orange Beach!

name: Alabama DS
text: Friendly customer service

resp.text: We are so glad that you enjoyed your experience and we hope to see you again soon!

name: Wanda DiStefano (Wanda D)
text: I love the one of a kind appeal and gifts!  Friendly staff,  great store!

resp.text: thanks👍

name: Shelley Wallace
text: Great store & high quality inventory. Certainly not your cheap run of the mill souvenir shop.

resp.text: Thanks for coming in & your review!

name: Cynthia Timmerman
text: Cute stuff, a little on the expensive side, great concept

resp.text: Thank you! Come back and shop with us soon!

name: Jacob Chad
text: Not only is OB my favorite place, the one time I went to this store I knew why!!! Customer service is amazing, products are great quality.

resp.text: Thank you Chad!

name: Anna Barton
text: Great clothing

resp.text: Thanks Anna!

name: Kristy Boulds
text: Couldn’t get service while on vacation at Orange Beach AL ?? What the ?

resp.text: Hello Kristy! We are so sorry about your lack of service during your vacation! Can you tell us what day you came into our store, so we can better know how to fix this problem? Please come back and see us! We promise the next time will be a better experience!

name: Jeanne Priest
text: Absolutely love this market! So accommodating and truly make a person feel welcome! Owners have created a "small town" market atmosphere with their hospitality and business model!

name: David Hart
text: Made us feel like family! We had pizza with "fresh toppings @ no extra charge"and the kids had hamburgers,,, Both was fantastic!  Def recommend!

name: Kevin
text: Best place in Orange beach

name: Angela Granier
text: Best hamburgers around! Prices are unbeatable. This is my go -to spot.

name: Ben Redmond
text: During our week long stay at The Wharf we ate at The Market almost everyday! Down home Southern atmosphere,  Greaaaaat fresh made to order pizza, could not believe toppings was not an extra charge! Our kids loved the black angus burgers.. and half the price of the other burger joints!...My thing we’re the home cooked biscuits for breakfast! I thought Hardee’s had good bacon and egg biscuits till I ate at The Market!

name: Владислав Айворонскогож
text: Very useful place at the Wharf, we found everything from small miscellaneous things to baked pizzas and cold snacks the enjoy around the property. Has a very friendly family owned atmosphere.

name: Madison Fox
text: This is the best place with the BEST customer service! Wonderful people, always a pleasure shopping here.

name: Jeanne Kerce
text: They are awesome people down to earth. N friendly atmosphere

name: Ashley Lusby
text: LOVE this cute boutique! Lots of fun finds from jewelry to candles and super cute clothings options. I love stopping in when I need a gift for a friend or family member! And the staff is very kind and helpful!

name: Andrea Lindholm
text: Love this store! Its beautiful  with friendly staff. So much to look at and buy!

name: Nathan Boone
text: Very clean. Wife loved it here

name: Amanda Dykes
text: Beautiful store with beautiful merchandise. This store always makes me happy.

name: Melissa Varela
text: Beautiful store and curation. Zero options for women of size which is disappointing.

name: Raven Nicholle Danger
text: Some of the items are definitely pricey, but this by far has been the most stand out and unique store we have seen in the area. It smells great too. Full of personality and expressions of creativity and positivity

name: Gage Pip
text:
Overall, I loved the aesthetic of the business. It’s very cute and chic, and I can definitely tell that it is someone’s “ocean child.”

However, upon entrance I noticed that all of the customers were wearing masks, but ironically the workers were not? Then, as I was shopping one of the female workers approached me after I said something about a piece of clothing. She did not hear what I said, so I went to say “I was just talking to my friend,” in which she responded with: “Sorry, I can’t hear you because of your mask.”

Last time I checked, Alabama is under a mask ordinance. You would think if an employer cared about their workers, they would be following what the CDC recommends.

That could just be my opinion.

I would just appreciate if the business made an attempt to provide a safe work environment for their employees and customers.

name: Jennifer Spahn
text: Great aesthetic & customer service!!!  Unique & beautiful gifts and souvenirs.
